iisEditors.h

00001 #ifndef iisEditors_H
00002 #define iisEditors_H
00003 
00004 #include <QtGui>
00005 #include <QtCore>
00006 
00007 #include "iisDropList.h"
00008 
00009 class TBaseValue;
00010 
00011 //***************************************************************************//
00012 //
00013 // TButtonEditor Class
00014 //
00015 // It is the base class for external Button Editor which could be assigned for 
00016 // Item Editor.
00017 //
00018 //***************************************************************************//
00019 
00020 class TButtonEditor : public QObject
00021 {
00022     friend class TDropList;
00023 
00024 public:
00025     virtual QWidget* createEditor(TDropList *parent);
00026     
00027 protected:
00028     void        doPickValue(QVariant v)
00029     { m_dropList->doPicked(v); }
00030 
00031     TDropList   *m_dropList;
00032     TBaseValue  *m_editedValue;
00033 };
00034 
00035 //***************************************************************************//
00036 //
00037 // TPopupButtonEditor Class
00038 //
00039 // It is the class for external Button Editor which introduces a tool button 
00040 // by clicking on which you could show some pop-up window for editing.
00041 //
00042 //***************************************************************************//
00043 
00044 class TPopupButtonEditor : public TButtonEditor
00045 {
00046     Q_OBJECT
00047 public:
00048     virtual QWidget* createEditor(TDropList *parent);
00049 
00050 protected:
00051     QToolButton     *m_button;
00052 
00053 protected slots:
00054     virtual void    buttonClicked() = 0;
00055 };
00056 
00057 //***************************************************************************//
00058 //
00059 // TSpinButtonEditor class
00060 //
00061 // Provides Button Editor with spin (up-down arrows) control.
00062 //
00063 //***************************************************************************//
00064 
00065 class TSpinButtonEditor : public TButtonEditor
00066 {
00067     Q_OBJECT
00068 public:
00069     virtual QWidget* createEditor(TDropList *parent);
00070 
00071 protected:
00072     QToolButton     *m_up, *m_down;
00073 
00074 protected slots:
00075     virtual void    buttonClickedUp() = 0;
00076     virtual void    buttonClickedDown() = 0;
00077 };
00078 
00079 //***************************************************************************//
00080 //
00081 // TComboEditor Class
00082 //
00083 // It is the base class for external Combo (in-list) Editor which could be assigned for 
00084 // Item Editor.
00085 //
00086 //***************************************************************************//
00087 
00088 class TComboEditor
00089 {
00090     friend class TDropList;
00091 
00092 public:
00093     TComboEditor();
00094     virtual ~TComboEditor() {};
00095 
00096     const QString& text() const 
00097     { return m_text; }
00098 
00099     virtual void invoke(TBaseValue *item) = 0;
00100 
00101 protected:
00102     void    doPickValue(QVariant v)
00103     { m_dropList->doPicked(v); }
00104 
00105     TDropList   *m_dropList;
00106     QString     m_text;
00107 };
